body.name: Garment Steamer, PERFECTDAY Portable Handheld Steamer Mini Travel Steamer for Travel and Fabric
features: PREMIUM QUALITY, BUILT TO LAST: Unquestionable performance! Powered by 800 W with steam flow 18 g per min that soften the fabric and remove wrinkles, with 8 steam nozzle holes that provide rapid venting and enough water vapor steaming temperature, comes with fur brush to remove dust, dirt or debris from your clothes.

COMPACT DESIGN, TRAVEL-FRIENDLY: Forget about bulk and heavy steaming system! Get our portable fabric steamer device and enjoy the hassle-free traveling. Removable nozzle head, easily fit on your hand carry luggage or great for storing at home at the same time save some space for other important stuff. Suitable for home, office and travel.

SUITS FOR ALL TYPES OF FABRIC: Everything you need to iron every piece of fabric at home or travel, like organic fabrics, nylon blend, wool, cotton, linen and much more. Effectively steam and removes crease and wrinkle of your clothing like suits, jersey, blouse, wedding dress, or great for household items like bed linens, table-cloth, napkins, sofa fabric, curtains and more.

SAFE AUTO-SHUT OFF + LARGE TANK CAPACITY: Dual safety protection system that automatically shut-off when too hot or shortage of water and will automatically reset. The more the merrier, fill with 100 ml water (do not exceeds) that can give about 10 minutes of continuous steam of your clothes and garments.
BEST GARMENT STEAMER – Travel enthusiast SAY this is ‘the one to get’. It’s thoughtfully designed, solidly constructed. Get this ‘best in class’ portable steaming garment iron today.

productInformation.value: #144,360 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #48 in Travel Garment Steamers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The 800W Clothing Steamer produces powerful steam, which never sprays water. Say Goodbye To The Wrinkles.

The portable steamer is certified by Electrical Testing Laboratories in compliance with North American safety standards. There is automatic shut-off function when the unit gets too hot or the water level is too low. Fast heating technology ensures quick steaming performances!
Unique 2 layer leak-proof design.No leaking, No spilling!
The only travel steamer on the market with BPA free. Safe to use on all types of fabric. You can use fabric brush to clean visible dust from deep inside fabric and brush away stubborn wrinkles.
Light Weight makes it an ideal travel companion . Carry it with you anywhere, anytime!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic little steamer! So much better than I expected based on negative reviews!
reviews.reviewText: Don't let the negative reviews discourage you from purchasing this amazing little steamer. It's exactly what I was hoping for. The water begins to boil within a few minutes creating enough steam to get rid of wrinkles on two items then just refill if you need to do more. It was effective on silk, polyester and cotton, alike. As with any item that holds water, completely empty and dry out the vessel or it will accumulate water deposits that could damage the device, especially if using tap water. If you attempt to use this horizontally, like an iron, it will, of course, leak and spit water. You must use this steamer vertically. Just hang your item and steam away. I find it the perfect size for traveling, as it fits in my cosmetic bag rather nicely. Do not use the brush attachment on delicate fabrics. Just use the flat metal piece and you will not snag your fabric. I feel these tips are no-brainers, but negative reviews indicated malfunction of the device when I actually suspect malfunction of the human. Love my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but Useful
reviews.reviewText: The water tank capacity is surprisingly generous for its size. The transparent design of the tank allows for easy monitoring of the water level, preventing any surprises during use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I wouldn't buy again
reviews.reviewText: Wrinkles barely move, leaks a lot...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for touch ups and travel!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a MINI steamer. It only holds a very small amount of water, so it runs for just a few minutes before it needs to be refilled. Then you have to wait for it to cool before you can remove the steamer head to add more water. So this is not good for a large item unless you have plenty of time. However, it does a good job and I would recommend it. Keeping mine for travel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after I read the reviews. They seemed mostly good. So I figured I would give it a try. This is a horrible steamer. All it did was leak water all over everything, water spots galore. Smaller water tank so constantly refill it. And you have to make sure you let it cool all the way down because you have to take the top off to fill up. You will get burned if you don't let it cool down. The only decent thing about it was the power button and it heated up quickly. Other then that waste of time buying it. I don't know if I got a defective one or what since I read good reviews on it. But it is cheaply made...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for the price
reviews.reviewText: I read a ton of reviews before buying a steamer and this was highly rated for the price. It's not bad and did the job but 1. Does spit water at first, make sure to not overfill at all and 2. The well isn't very big at all, I only got 1 shirt done with a full well. That's fine if that's all you do but if you plan on using it for longer or bigger items till be refilling A Lot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and perfect
reviews.reviewText: Easy, compact and powerful. Does exactly what it is designed for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works perfectly, used for international pot luck at church
reviews.reviewText: loved the function and ease of operation

I know this product is for fabric, as in clothing! But believe Me, I used for the seats in my car, a bit of stains on the headliner in my car and it just work great! Absolute fantastic. Highly recommend this product!J.E.stein
